dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach solving complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data, identify patterns, and use evidence-based reasoning to solve problems.
Your FarTwin will approach problems from unconventional angles, using intuition and outside-the-box thinking.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle taking calculated risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold, decisive action to seize opportunities and drive growth.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh the pros and cons before taking risks, prioritizing stability over growth.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will build strong relationships, listening actively and contributing ideas to achieve shared goals.
Your FarTwin will fiercely advocate for their own interests, working individually to drive results.

dimensions.label: Analytical Thinking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin analyze and interpret data?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex problems into manageable parts, using systematic analysis to uncover insights.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and pattern recognition to make sense of data and identify trends.

dimensions.label: Learning Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach continuous learning?

options.description: Your FarTwin will follow established curricula and seek out formal education to expand their knowledge.
Your FarTwin will take charge of their own learning, seeking out resources and exploring topics on their own terms.

dimensions.label: Emotional Intelligence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage emotions in the workplace?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize understanding and validation, using emotional intelligence to build strong relationships.
Your FarTwin will maintain a professional demeanor, bouncing back from setbacks with adaptability and determination.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks and manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will anticipate challenges and take proactive steps to stay on track, ensuring timely completion of projects.
Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances, adjusting their schedule as needed to accommodate unexpected tasks or setbacks.

dimensions.label: Creativity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creative challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will think outside the box, embracing new ideas and experimenting with novel approaches.
Your FarTwin will refine existing concepts, using precision and attention to detail to create high-quality work.
